title: Eric Newman of JC Newman - America's Oldest Cigar Manufacturer
itunes:title: Eric Newman of JC Newman - America's Oldest Cigar Manufacturer
description:
This week we welcome to the show Eric Newman, the President of America’s oldest family owned cigar manufacturer. Next year the company behind Diamond Crown, Julius Caesar, Brick House and Perla Del Mar will be celebrating their 125th Anniversary. We will take a look at the company past, present and future as we light up the Brick House Double Connecticut Mighty Mighty from The Cigar Authority Care Package

In the second hour we debut the return of Mi Querida Firecracker from Dunbarton Tobacco & Trust. The cigar goes on sale Monday morning at 10am and we will have all the details of this explosive cigar that will sell out in just hours.

We will have this all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
